metadata.title: CVE-2023-52507 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nfc: nci: assert requested protocol is validThe protocol is used in a bit mask to determine if the protocol issupported. Assert the provided protocol is less than the maximumdefined so it doesn't potentially perform a shift-out-of-bounds andprovide a clearer error for undefined protocols vs unsupported ones.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
